Will | Increases attack power by 2%. | |

Treat 2020 | |

or Treat 2020 | |

| Increases natural PP recovery by 20%. | Crimson Fellwyrm Over the Castle

normal attacks.

weapon is sheathed.

Natural PP regeneration rate reduced by 100% while weapon is unsheathed.

power is increased by 3%. | Trick or Treat 2020 | |
S3: Persistent
Fury | Increases attack power by 4% and critical hit rate by 5%.

Enhances PP efficiency as follows:
PP recovery +10%
Active PP recovery +15%
PP consumption -5%.
Effects will be lost when damage is taken (180s cooldown).

| | Dia Series
Geometry Series |

the Petalsea | While Petalgleam, Seagleam, or Snowgleam are active, natural

S-Grade Augment | Effects | Weapon Drops | Special Augment Factor |

| Critical hit rate of frontal attacks is increased by 30% while Valiant
Stance is active. | |

Loque

Chain | Gain invincibility for 5 seconds when Chain Trigger is activated. |
|
Atlas
Radda

EX

|
S4: Instant Guard
Photons | Recover 10 PP when performing a Perfect Guard. | |
Atlas
Farder

Atlas
Farder EX

|
S4: Lifesteal |
Restores HP equal to 1% of damage dealt (30 HP Max). | |

Atlas Alz


Atlas Alz EX

|
S4: Mettle of the
Rested | Gain knockback immunity after standing still for 1 second. | |
Atlas
Drache

Atlas
Drache EX

|
S4: Photon
Adaptation | Improves natural and active PP recovery and reduces PP
consumption based on your maximum PP.

The formula for this benefit is
(Player's Max PP - 120) x 0.1
The maximum benefit of 30% requires 420 Max PP.

| |
Atlas
Victo


Atlas Victo EX

|
S4: Photonic Trap
| Inreases PP restored by Tactical Trap by 20%. | |

Atlas Volare


Atlas Volare EX

|
S4: Prolonged
Katana Release | Reduces the depletion of the Focus Gauge while Katana Focus
is active.
(Roughly 20% slower gauge loss) | |
Atlas Valua

Atlas
Valua EX

|
S4: Providential
Refinement | Increases the potency of Element Conversion by 5% for non-
matching weapon elements.
| | Atlas
Zems

Atlas Zems
EX

|
S4: Second
Whirlwind | Increases the duration of Double Saber's wind flourish by 4
seconds. | |
Atlas
Vire


Atlas Vire
EX

|
S4: Steely
Determination | Survives one fatal hit with 1 HP. Does not work if HP is
already at 1. Activates once per quest. | | Atlas
Weisz


Atlas Weisz
EX

|
S4: Support
Amplification | Shifta and Deband's maximum duration becomes 120 seconds. |
|
Atlas Exocet


Atlas Exocet EX

|
S4: Sustained
Cycle | Reduces the cooldown of Photon Flare by 20%. | |
Atlas
Letra

Atlas
Letra EX

|
S4: Swift Arrows
| Increases the damage of all attacks done with a Bow by 3% when Rapid Fire
is active. | |
Atlas
Agria

Atlas Agria
EX

|

Circle | Changes the weapon element to match the currently equipped
elemental defense ring.
Has no effect if an elemental ring is not equipped. | |

EX

Increases Wand normal attack speed by 1.1x and negates hitstop. | |
